original_text: Moses and Aaron recorded the descendants of Merari who worked at the Tent of Meeting. The Lord had told Moses that they must do that.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 므라리 자손들의 종족 중 계수된 자니라

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron recorded the descendants of Merari
who worked at the Tent of Meeting
